phrs.translation: 壮丽, 华丽, 宏大

sentences.sentence: Were I in the warm room with all the splendor and magnificence!
sentences.translation: 要是我在那个温暖的房间里，打扮得富丽堂皇，那该多好啊！

sentences.sentence: The greatest splendor and the greatest magnificence one can imagine await them.
sentences.translation: 人们所能想象到的最伟大的辉煌和壮丽都在等待着它们。

sentences.sentence: To enjoy the magnificence of a mountain, you have to look upwards in most cases. To enjoy Huangshan, however, you've got to look downward.
sentences.translation: 要欣赏大山的宏伟壮丽，通常得向上看。但要欣赏黄山美景，得向下看。
